definition: belonging to or characteristic of a sect, a member of a sect
details:
adjective
- belonging to or characteristic of a sect
= example: belonging to or characteristic of a sect
- of or relating to or characteristic of a sect or sects
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of a sect or sects
noun
- a member of a sect
= example: a member of a sect
= synonyms: sectary, sectarist
